items.title: User Activity Sharing
items.description: Enable users to share their workout activities and progress with friends within the app.
acceptance_criteria: User can post completed workouts to a social feed
Friends can view, like, and comment on shared activities
non_functional: Feed updates should load within 2 seconds
Support at least 10,000 concurrent users without performance degradation

items.title: Friends and Followers System
items.description: Allow users to connect with others by adding friends or following profiles.
acceptance_criteria: User can search for other users by name or username
User can send and accept friend requests or follow/unfollow others
non_functional: Search results should return within 1 second
System should handle up to 1 million user profiles efficiently

notes: Assumed that the core fitness tracking functionality exists and the requirement focuses on adding social interaction features.
